remarks: Function-builder for derivative, chain rule.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 1-Sep-2014.)
statement:
dvmptco.s $e |- ( ph -> S e. { RR , CC } ) $.
dvmptco.t $e |- ( ph -> T e. { RR , CC } ) $.
dvmptco.a $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. X ) -> A e. Y ) $.
dvmptco.b $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. X ) -> B e. V ) $.
dvmptco.c $e |- ( ( ph /\ y e. Y ) -> C e. CC ) $.
dvmptco.d $e |- ( ( ph /\ y e. Y ) -> D e. W ) $.
dvmptco.da $e |- ( ph -> ( S _D ( x e. X |-> A ) ) = ( x e. X |-> B ) ) $.
dvmptco.dc $e |- ( ph -> ( T _D ( y e. Y |-> C ) ) = ( y e. Y |-> D ) ) $.
dvmptco.e $e |- ( y = A -> C = E ) $.
dvmptco.f $e |- ( y = A -> D = F ) $.
dvmptco $p |- ( ph -> ( S _D ( x e. X |-> E ) ) = ( x e. X |-> ( F x. B ) ) ) $.
$d A y $.
$d C x $.
$d D x $.
$d E y $.
$d F y $.
$d T y $.
$d V x $.
$d W y $.
$d X x $.
$d Y x y $.
$d ph x y $.
